######User guide for the BMI and BMR calculator

1. You need to know your <b>Height</b>, <b>Weight</b> ,<b>Age</b> and <b>Gender</b> inorder for this app to give results to you.     
2. Weight has to be in <b>Kgs</b> and Height has to be in <b>cms</b>  
3. Age in <b>years</b>
4. BMI is the <b>Body Mass Index</b> and BMR is <b>Basal Metabolic Rate</b>


Note: Calculate button is for first time use only
